reviews.review: Incredible movie! Heroes are only as big as their villain and Thanos is the perfect archvillain in this epic tale!

They’ve done it. Somehow they’ve done it. Avengers Infinity War is the best Marvel film in a long long time and as someone who’s not enjoyed them for a quite a while this is quite the compliment. From the outset it’s clear that this is a different type of Marvel film. The stakes are much more threatening, no one is safe. Thanos is a fantastic villain and is given a real backstory that almost makes you emphasize with him at certain points. Well, almost. All the characters are given ample screen time and its is a credit to the writers and directors that somehow it all works. Tony Stark, Thor and the Guardians were all a personal highlight for me but all characters are treated well and fairly. There are twist and turns and truly shocking moments that even brought me to tears. I can’t believe I’m writing all this about a Marvel film but trust me it really is that good. Action sequences are well handled and special effects are on point for the most part. It’s up there with the best Marvel films and is by far as good as it could possibly have been given the weight of expectation.

Infinity War is a great time at the theater. Fans of the MCU will not be disappointed. The ending will leave your jaw all the way to the ground. Thanos is a great villain, but there are 1 or 2 times where the CGI was a little messy.

Amazing film; character development and arcs from the main two characters (Thor/Thanos) really brought insight into their personalities, how they cope with traumatic incidents and truly brought the film together as whole. A must-see spectacle that both fills you with both hope and dread for what comes next.
The best cinematic movie I have ever seen
Amazing movie 100 percent recommended and the acting was great too. Again lovely movie and I hope you enjoy it too. my favourite movie soo far and my favourire actors
Just watch it, it's goddamn beautiful.
o filme e simplesmente incrivel e sua premissa e fabulosa. uma verdadeira obra prima da marvel. o melhor filme ja feito
This film is that MCU needs. Smart, elegant and INCREDIBLE.

Seriously the only reason the audience score isn’t 100% is the dc fanboys hating the fact that marvel has done something dc failed to do with less recognizable characters. This film is brilliant and if you like even one may film it is a must watch.
